meanings.definition: An instrument in a vehicle that measures the distance traveled on a particular journey.
meanings.sent1: The tripmeter in the car showed we had driven 50 miles.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to reset the tripmeter before starting a new journey.
meanings.sent3: The tripmeter and the speedometer had a race to see who could reach 100 first.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a tripmeter, keeping track of every mile she traveled in life.
meanings.sent5: The tripmeter ticked away, recording each mile with precision.

meanings.definition: To measure the distance traveled on a particular journey using a tripmeter.
meanings.sent1: I always tripmeter my road trips to know the exact distance covered.
meanings.sent2: Remember to tripmeter the distance when driving to the next town.
meanings.sent3: He decided to tripmeter his walk to the park just for fun.
meanings.sent4: She tripmetered her way through the marathon, pacing herself perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The explorer tripmetered his expedition through the treacherous terrain.
